## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Use Case
Describe the clinical or technical use case that motivates this feature.

### Clinical Context (if applicable)
- What clinical scenario would benefit from this feature?
- What problem does it solve for clinical users?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

### Example Syntax (if applicable)
```yaml
# Show how this feature might look in PSDL
```

## Alternatives Considered
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Impact Assessment
- [ ] This is a breaking change to the specification
- [ ] This requires changes to the parser
- [ ] This requires changes to the evaluator
- [ ] This requires new operators
- [ ] This is backward compatible

Add any other context, references, or screenshots about the feature request.
